TravelGo

Rethinking travel

Our vision is to make travel planning stress-free and make travel more fun.

Travelshift software was launched and tested in Iceland, where a booming tourism industry required an innovative software solution that simply didn’t exist until now.

Now is the time for us to expand our model into other markets.

Our management team

Ingi Shahin

Co-founder & Inventor

Ingolfur is the co-founder of Travelshift. His relentless quest for disrupting the status quo of travel led to the many killer innovations in Travelshift.

Xiaochen Tian

Co-founder & CEO

Xiaochen leads the diverse team of Travelshift with logical thinking and a focus to deliver the highest-standard result.

Sigurður Guðbrandsson

CTO

A natural hacker, Sigurdur rejoices in technology. He also possesses the rare quality of connecting technology with business goals.

Hlynur Hauksson

Head of Development

Hlynur builds and empowers teams, paving a smooth road for scaling up the technology and the business side of Travelshift.

Gisli Eyland

Head of Business Development

Gísli studies business as a hobby. This passion allows him to connect the dots for the ever evolving path of Travelshift.

Chris Ayliffe

Marketing

Chris is an experienced digital marketing manager whose background spans asset management, the legal industry and E-commerce.
